instructions: Choose the best answer for each of the following questions.

questions.question: Which is not a type of prototyping?
Which is not a key design issue?
Which is not a design process?
Iterative process through which requirements are translated into a “blueprint” for building software.
Establishes a basic structural framework that identifies the major components of system and the communication among these components.
A component reads streams of data on its inputs and produces streams of data on its outputs, delivering a complete instance of the result in a standard order.
Consists of a central data store and a set of independent components that access the data store.
Organizes a system into layers, each of which provide a set of services.
Technique of linking two or more computers into a network (usually via a LAN) in order to take advantage of the parallel processing power of those computers.
Makes applications easily adapt to changing technologies and integrate with other applications.
Describes how the software communicates within itself, to systems that interact with it, and with humans who use it.
Which is not a type of GoF Pattern?
